entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
